classes

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the superclass for the Client class and can represent both a client or a chef. Anyone attempting to register will have an instance of this class created.
    Author:
    Achraf Gharbi, Younes Laaboudi

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String firstName,
    java.lang.String surName,
    java.lang.String userName,
    java.lang.String password,
    UserRole role)
        Basic constructor for the User class. A user can be either a client or a chef.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user.
        surName - The surname of the user.
        userName - The username of the user. In order to register, the username selected must be different from all the other usernames.
        password - The password of the user.
        role - The role of the user, is either UserRole.Chef or UserRole.Client

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String userName,
    java.lang.String password)
        Quick constructor for the User class. Used for login.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username of the user. In order to register, the username selected must be different from all the other usernames.
        password - The password of the user.
